Gloriavale’s Overseeing Shepherd ordered to pay former members found to be employees $274,000 in legal costs https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gloriavales-overseeing-shepherd-ordered-to-pay-former-members-found-to-be-employees-274000-in-legal-costs/PIPDUPBXZBGDFZQ66ZDD5BLU4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gloriavales-overseeing-shepherd-ordered-to-pay-former-members-found-to-be-employees-274000-in-legal-costs/PIPDUPBXZBGDFZQ66ZDD5BLU4/ It comes after six women, working under punishing conditions, were found to be employees. Tue, 03 Dec 2024 05:00:05 +0000 The Employment Court's chief judge Christina Inglis last year found former Gloriavale members (From left to right) Crystal Loyal, Virginia Courage, Serenity Pilgrim, Anna Courage, Rose Standtrue and Pearl Valor were employees, not volunteers.
